Rule.Name: Namespaces should be Pascal Cased
Rule.Description: OpenGI Coding standards states that Namespaces should be Pascal Cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the casing of the namespace to conform to the coding standards.

Rule.Name: Namespaces should start OpenGI.OpenTrader
Rule.Description: Open GI Coding standards state that namespaces should start "OpenGI.OpenTrader".

Rule.Name: Method names should be Pascal Cased
Rule.Description: Open GI Coding standards state that method names should be Pascal Cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the name of the method to be Pascal Cased.

Rule.Name: Method parameters should be Camel Cased
Rule.Description: Open GI Coding standards state that method parameters should be camel Cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the casing of the affected method property to be camel Case.

Rule.Name: Local variables should be Camel Cased.
Rule.Description: Open GI coding standards state that local variables should be camel cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the casing of the affected variable to be camel Case.

Rule.Name: Class names should be Pascal Cased.
Rule.Description: Open GI coding standards state that class names should be Pascal Cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the casing of the affected class name to be Pascal Case.

Rule.Name: Interfaces should start with 'I' and be pascal cased.
Rule.Description: Open GI coding standards state that Interface should start with 'I'.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the interface name to start with 'I'

Rule.Name: Property names should be Pascal cased.
Rule.Description: Open GI coding standards state that Property Names should be Pascal Cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the casing of the affected property to be Pascal Cased.

Rule.Name: Fields should be prefixed with '_' and be camel cased.
Rule.Description: Open GI coding standards state that fields should be prefixed with '_' and be camel cased.
Rule.Resolution: Alter the name of the affected field to start _ and be camel cased.
